subject: Subpoenas
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors have asked Greg LeMond, the three-time Tour de France champion, to provide documents pertaining to Lance Armstrong and the last four cycling teams for which he has competed.
snippet: Federal prosecutors have asked Greg LeMond, the three-time Tour de France champion, to provide documents pertaining to Lance Armstrong and the last four cycling teams for which he has competed.
